title: ME SEE CHAMPION, ME FIGHT THAT CHAMPION
body:
Hey, ever think that there's more to League than fighting and chasing?

Oh wait, I have a champion that does things and has abilities. That means I should fight if I see another champion right? Yes. Yes yes yes.

I'm in enemy jung with no vision and cant see any other enemy champions on the map except one in front of me. I will fight that champion. I will fight. I'm a champion after all, and champions are winners. I am THE champion.

Me see. Me fight. Yes, me do fight. Me fight very good.

Because if our team is behind I need to try to get a shutdown 1v1 on a champion that is 3 levels ahead of me and $2500 gold up right? That's a good plan.

Me see. Me fight. Me see--------------------- Me fight. Yes, me fight very good.

What's a minion? I see champion, me fight that instead.

What's a lane? I see champion, me fight.

What's a ward? Don't need wards when me can see champions right in front of me. Me fight that champeeun.

Me see. Me fight.

When me see and me don't fight we lose game, so I may as well see and fight to increase chances. Yes, me in Gold. Me high elo. You no come to fight when me see and fight. You bad.

Why are you clearing waves when you could be seeing and fighting. You no come when I'm inting. When I int and you don't come, it's your fault. After all:

Me see. Me fight.

Me see. Me fight.

Me see----------------------------- Me. Me fight.

Why are you managing waves. You see a champeeun, you fight that champeeun. 

This is how we win games, by seeing and fighting.

May Nasus live forever and ride in peace. Amen.

See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. See. Fight. 

We lost. My team is bad.

I saw, I fought. That's all I've ever known. I'm a rustic cowboy, taking on the world. If no one else sees or fights, who is going to do the seeing and fighting?

I. I will fight. I will see. And I will fight. With my champeeun powers. My champion has abilities. That means, I can fight. And when I see, well then. Then, I fight. I fight to win. I fight for my team. I fight because I care. I fight, because I know that fighting is the way to win. Always. Always. Always.

And I told my team if they don't come when I fight, then we lose. So my seeing and fighting is the solution, and they don't see that.

Me see. Me fight.

Hur. Dur. Hur dur hur. Hur hur dur hur hur hur. Hurrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrr.

See. Fight.

End of Story.

The End.

Of.

The Story.

Right Here.

Book Title: Seeing and Fighting - A Comprehensive Guide to League of Legends

Table of Contents:

Chapter 1  ---- Seeing
Chapter 2  ---- Fighting
Chapter 3  ---- Me
